name: Falcon
description: Falcon is a Telegram userbot that running on Python , It help you to manage your telegram easily

TELEGRAM_STRING_SESSION.description: Get this value by running [python3 string_session.py] in Termux or heroku[IMPORTANT]

HEROKU_APIKEY.description: very important for .update command to make falcon up-to-date , get it from 'https://dashboard.heroku.com/account.

HEROKU_APPNAME.description: enter this app name agin here, very inportant for .update comand to make falcon up-to-date ,

FULL_SUDO.description: Enter your telegram id here. To get your telegram id goto @getidsbot and click on start button.
FULL_SUDO.value: Your Telegram ID will be a number of 9 or 10 digits.

SUDO_USERS.description: Enter your telegram id here. To get your telegram id goto @getidsbot and click on start button.
SUDO_USERS.value: Your Telegram ID will be a number of 9 or 10 digits.

GENIUS_API_TOKEN.description: need for .lyrics comand , Get your own api token from https://genius.com/developers (you can also use your API.)

VTOTAL_API.description: Needed for Virus scanning plugin. Get your api from https://virustotal.con/

CHROME_BIN.description: For Carbon.py. Leave as it is.

CHROME_DRIVER.description: For Carbon.py. Leave as it is.

COUNTRY.description: Set your Country to be used in the .time and .date commands.

TZ_NUMBER.description: Change this value in case your country has multiple Time Zones.

OPEN_WEATHER_MAP_APPID.description: need for .weather command, (API key)from https://api.openweathermap.org (if you have api enter your or leave it default.)

BOTLOG.description: Recommed to true ,BOTLOG_CHATID must be filled correct if you set it true

BOTLOG_CHATID.description: Important for wark some plugins,bot logs , make super group with @missrose_bot then type /id to get this value

CONSOLE_LOGGER_VERBOSE.description: BOTLOG_CHATID must be filled correct if you set it true

YOUTUBE_API_KEY.description: YouTube Data API Key for .youtube command. Get from https://console.cloud.google.com
YOUTUBE_API_KEY.value: Enter api here if you need

OCR_SPACE_API_KEY.description: OCR API Key for .read (read photo's text)command. Get from https://ocr.space/ocrapi (if you have api enter your or leave it default.)

REM_BG_API_KEY.description: API Key for .rbg(remove background picture) command. Get from https://www.remove.bg/api

CLEAN_WELCOME.description: When a new person joins, the old welcome message is deleted.

BIO_MESSAGE.description: custom bio message while u using .autobio command

PM_MESSAGE.description: you can edit what pm_protecter message!
PM_MESSAGE.value: Hey buddy drop your message and donot spam.

AFK_MESSAGE.value: Hey Buddy i am offline now, i will contact you later.

BLOCK_MESSAGE.value: I am not going to allow you to spam My master's PM, You have been blocked!

YOUR_SHORT_NAME.description: Name to show in alive message!

LYDIA_API_KEY.description: need for auto replay (lydia) future get api key from https://coffeehouse.intellivoid.net/

WEATHER_DEFCITY.description: Set the default city for the userbot's .weather module.

LOGSPAMMER.description: BOTLOG_CHATID must be filled correct if you set it true
